00013 #include "generic.h"
00014 #include "heap.h"
00015 
00016 #define VL_HEAP_DEF_FUNC(NAME, SUFFIX) NAME ## SUFFIX
00017 #define VL_HEAP_SWAP(NAME)   VL_HEAP_DEF_FUNC(NAME,_swap)
00018 #define VL_HEAP_UP(NAME)     VL_HEAP_DEF_FUNC(NAME,_up)
00019 #define VL_HEAP_DOWN(NAME)   VL_HEAP_DEF_FUNC(NAME,_down)
00020 #define VL_HEAP_PUSH(NAME)   VL_HEAP_DEF_FUNC(NAME,_push)
00021 #define VL_HEAP_POP(NAME)    VL_HEAP_DEF_FUNC(NAME,_pop)
00022 #define VL_HEAP_UPDATE(NAME) VL_HEAP_DEF_FUNC(NAME,_update)
00023 
00026 VL_INLINE void
00027 VL_HEAP_SWAP(NAME) (T * a, T * b)
00028 {
00029   T t = *a ;
00030   *a = *b ;
00031   *b = t ;
00032 }
00033 
00036 VL_INLINE void
00037 VL_HEAP_UP(NAME)
00038 (T * nodeArray, int unsigned numNodes, int unsigned nodeIndex)
00039 {
00040   int unsigned leftIndex  = vl_heap_left_child (nodeIndex) ;
00041   int unsigned rightIndex = vl_heap_right_child (nodeIndex) ;
00042 
00043   T * node  = nodeArray + nodeIndex ;
00044   T * left  = nodeArray + leftIndex ;
00045   T * right = nodeArray + rightIndex ;
00046 
00047   /* no childer: stop */
00048   if (leftIndex >= numNodes) return ;
00049 
00050   /* only left childer: easy */
00051   if (rightIndex >= numNodes) {
00052     if (CMP(node, left) > 0) {
00053       VL_HEAP_SWAP(NAME) (node, left) ;
00054     }
00055     return ;
00056   }
00057 
00058   /* both childern */
00059   {
00060     if (CMP(left, right) < 0) {
00061       /* swap with left */
00062       if (CMP(node, left) > 0) {
00063         VL_HEAP_SWAP(NAME) (node, left) ;
00064         VL_HEAP_UP(NAME) (nodeArray, numNodes, leftIndex) ;
00065       }
00066     } else {
00067       /* swap with right */
00068       if (CMP(node, right) > 0) {
00069         VL_HEAP_SWAP(NAME) (node, right) ;
00070         VL_HEAP_UP(NAME) (nodeArray, numNodes, rightIndex) ;
00071       }
00072     }
00073   }
00074 }
00075 
00078 VL_INLINE void
00079 VL_HEAP_DOWN(NAME)
00080 (T * nodeArray, int unsigned nodeIndex)
00081 {
00082   T * node ;
00083   T * parent ;
00084   int unsigned parentIndex ;
00085 
00086   if (nodeIndex == 0) return  ;
00087   parentIndex = vl_heap_parent (nodeIndex) ;
00088 
00089   node   = nodeArray + nodeIndex  ;
00090   parent = nodeArray + parentIndex ;
00091 
00092   if (CMP(node, parent) < 0) {
00093     VL_HEAP_SWAP(NAME) (node, parent) ;
00094     VL_HEAP_DOWN(NAME) (nodeArray, parentIndex) ;
00095   }
00096 }
00097 
00100 VL_INLINE void
00101 VL_HEAP_PUSH(NAME)
00102 (T * nodeArray, int unsigned *numNodes)
00103 {
00104   VL_HEAP_DOWN(NAME) (nodeArray, *numNodes) ;
00105   *numNodes += 1 ;
00106 }
00107 
00110 VL_INLINE T *
00111 VL_HEAP_POP(NAME)
00112 (T * nodeArray, int unsigned *numNodes)
00113 {
00114   T * root ;
00115   T * last ;
00116 
00117   if (*numNodes == 0) return NULL ;
00118 
00119   *numNodes -= 1 ;
00120   root = nodeArray + 0 ;
00121   last = nodeArray + *numNodes ;
00122 
00123   VL_HEAP_SWAP(NAME) (root, last) ;
00124 
00125   if (*numNodes > 1) {
00126     VL_HEAP_UP(NAME) (nodeArray, *numNodes, 0) ;
00127   }
00128   return last ;
00129 }
00130 
00133 VL_INLINE void
00134 VL_HEAP_UPDATE(NAME)
00135 (T * nodeArray,
00136  int unsigned numNodes,
00137  int unsigned nodeIndex)
00138 {
00139   VL_HEAP_UP(NAME) (nodeArray, numNodes, nodeIndex) ;
00140   VL_HEAP_DOWN(NAME) (nodeArray, nodeIndex) ;
00141 }
